title: Daycare Operator Reportedly Took Snow Shovel to the Face in Effort to Stop Drunk Dad From Taking Off With His Kids
text:
Daycare Operator Reportedly Took Snow Shovel to the Face in Effort to Stop Drunk Dad From Taking Off With His Kids 
Published By: Gawker.com - Today 
Cops say a female Montana daycare operator was brutally assaulted last week while trying to protect three kids from their allegedly drunk da...
